50dma.label: 50-Day Moving Average
50dma.description: The average closing price over the past 50 trading days

200dma.label: 200-Day Moving Average
200dma.description: The average closing price over the past 200 trading days

prevdate.label: Previous Date
prevdate.description: The date of the previous data point

date.label: Date
date.description: The date associated with the data point

3dma.label: 3-Day Moving Average
3dma.description: The average closing price over the past 3 trading days

7dma.label: 7-Day Moving Average
7dma.description: The average closing price over the past 7 trading days

macdprev.label: Previous MACD
macdprev.description: The MACD value from the previous data point

macdchange.label: MACD Change
macdchange.description: The change in MACD value since the previous data point

dmadiff.label: DMA Difference
dmadiff.description: The difference between shorter and longer DMAs (e.g., 50dma - 200dma)

3dmaweekly.label: Weekly 3-Day Moving Average
3dmaweekly.description: The average weekly closing price over the past 3 weeks

7dmaweekly.label: Weekly 7-Day Moving Average
7dmaweekly.description: The average weekly closing price over the past 7 weeks

50dmaweekly.label: Weekly 50-Day Moving Average
50dmaweekly.description: The average weekly closing price over the past 50 weeks

200dmaweekly.label: Weekly 200-Day Moving Average
200dmaweekly.description: The average weekly closing price over the past 200 weeks

macdweekly.label: Weekly MACD
macdweekly.description: MACD calculated over a weekly timeframe

macdchangeweekly.label: Weekly MACD Change
macdchangeweekly.description: The change in MACD value since the previous week

dmadiffweekly.label: Weekly DMA Difference
dmadiffweekly.description: The difference between shorter and longer weekly DMAs

dmadiffprev.label: Previous DMA Difference
dmadiffprev.description: DMA difference value of the previous data point

dmadiffweeklyprev.label: Previous Week's DMA Difference
dmadiffweeklyprev.description: The DMA difference value from two weeks ago

macdweeklyprev.label: Previous Week's MACD
macdweeklyprev.description: The MACD value from two weeks ago

dma3prev.label: 3-Day Moving Average (2 periods ago)
dma3prev.description: The 3-day moving average calculated two data points in the past

dma3weeklyprev.label: Weekly 3-DMA (2 periods ago)
dma3weeklyprev.description: The weekly 3-day moving average calculated two weeks ago

momo.label: Momentum
momo.description: Rate of change of price for a specific (short) period

momoweekly.label: Weekly Momentum
momoweekly.description: Rate of change of price over a weekly timeframe

dma3prevprev.label: 3-Day Moving Average (3 periods ago)
dma3prevprev.description: The 3-day moving average calculated three data points in the past

dma3weeklyprevprev.label: Weekly 3-DMA (3 periods ago)
dma3weeklyprevprev.description: The weekly 3-day moving average calculated three weeks ago

score.label: Custom Score
score.description: Calculated score, potentially combining technical factors

scoreprev.label: Previous Custom Score
scoreprev.description: The custom score from the previous data point

scoredate.label: Score Calculation Date
scoredate.description: The date on which the custom score was calculated

dyna3dma.label: Dynamic 3-Day MA
dyna3dma.description: Moving average with length adjusted based on volatility

dyna3dmaweekly.label: Weekly Dynamic 3-Day
dyna3dmaweekly.description: The dynamic 3-day moving average value every week

dyna3dmaprev.label: Previous Dynamic 3-Day MA
dyna3dmaprev.description: The dynamic 3-day moving average value from the previous data point

dyna3dmaweeklyprev.label: Weekly Prev. Dynamic 3-DMA
dyna3dmaweeklyprev.description: The previous week's dynamic 3-day moving average

scorediff.label: Custom Score Change
scorediff.description: The change in the custom score since the previous data point

scorelast.label: Most Recent Custom Score
scorelast.description: The most recent value of the custom score
